Who We Are?

SolarGain is an official Affiliate to the SolarCoin Foundation.
SolarLux offers a range of services to make SolarCoin accessible for companies in the energy business. We help you claim and use SolarCoins for your enterprise to be a first mover into the space of solar blockchain incentives.

Our Mission

Our goal at is to help the solar industry to make use of the opportunities SolarCoin offers.
